titles.title: I will sing unto the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
// I will sing unto the Lord, for he has triumphed gloriously;
the horse and rider thrown into the sea. //

verse.name: c1
v2
verse.lines:
// I will sing unto the Lord, for he has triumphed gloriously;
The chariots and host thrown into the sea //

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
// The Lord my God; oh man of war, has now become my victory //
// The Lord is God and I will praise him, my father is God and I will exalt him //

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
// I will sing unto the Lord, for he has triumphed gloriously;
They went down like a stone into the deep //

verse.name: c3
v4
verse.lines:
// I will sing unto the Lord, for he has triumphed gloriously;
He plants them on his mountain that is green //

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
// Oh Lord my God, the place the spot, which thou made for thy sanctuary //
// The Lord will reign and I will praise him, my father will reign and I will exalt him //
